WCAG 2.1 AA Accessibility Testing

Contrast Ratio: Text must have at least 4.5:1 contrast (AA), 7:1 (AAA).

Focus Order: Keyboard navigation must follow logical reading order.

Responsive Design: Layout must adapt to all screen sizes without loss of content.

Color Independence: Information must not rely on color alone.

Keyboard Access: All functionality must be accessible via keyboard.
